content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. What is your name so I can better assist you with your electrical service request?
Thank you, Carol! Could you please provide the address where you need the electrical service?
Great, thank you! Could you tell me a bit about what electrical work you need help with?
I need a couple outlets fixed and I think a light switch is shorting.
Thanks for letting me know! When would be an ideal time for you to schedule the electrical work?
Honestly, I'm so busy this month, I can't schedule anything right now. Sorry for the trouble.
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time

content: No problem at all, Carol! If your schedule frees up or it's more convenient later, just let us know and we'll be happy to help. Have a great day!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time
